file_insights.changes_summary: Added aria-label attributes to IDE buttons for improved accessibility

patterns_discovered: Accessibility improvement pattern: Adding descriptive aria-label to interactive elements
Button configuration with variant, size, and icon props
Dropdown menu implementation with trigger and menu items
gotchas_discovered: Buttons lacked accessibility labels before this change
Interactive elements without aria-labels can be problematic for screen readers
recommendations: Continue adding descriptive aria-labels to all interactive elements
Conduct accessibility testing to ensure screen reader compatibility
Consider creating a consistent aria-label naming convention across the application
